general_advisory: Light to moderate rainfall may occur on Saturday & Sunday with generally cloudy sky condition. Keep the harvested paddy in a safe place with polythene to protect it from rain. Make provisions for draining out excess rainwater in late duration rice crop.

advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy.
Using rainwater, puddle the nursery beds 2-3 times followed by planking.
Picking of cotton crop is in progress.
Planting season is November to February.
After receding of rain, plant in well-drained soil.
